column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I'm giving a 4 because this is my second time here and I didn't love everything the first time
column2: but I did love everything the second time.  So there you go
column3: a nice even 4.  Tapas are the best invention in the world because everyone gets a taste of everything and if one little thing is not great
column4: you get to try some of everything else.  Every time I go to a restaurant I annoy the b/f because I can never decide what I want
column5: there are too many choices.  So tapas are my favorite.  Here's what we had from both my visits.  I'll go from best to not so much the best:
